channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

Trump asks Supreme Court for OK to cut teacher-training money as part of anti-DEI push
item.description: The Trump administration has asked the Supreme Court to allow it to cut hundreds of millions of dollars for teacher training.

item.title: Tufts grad student taken into custody by federal agents in Somerville
item.description: A Tufts University international graduate student was taken into custody by federal authorities Tuesday, according to the school and her attorney.

item.title: US projected to default this summer absent congressional action
item.description: The debt ceiling, currently at $36.1 trillion, establishes a statutory limit that the government may borrow.

item.title: Supreme Court upholds Biden rule requiring serial numbers and background checks for ghost guns
Trump admin live updates: Hegseth says 'nobody's texting war plans' amid chat fallout
item.description: Tulsi Gabbard told the House Intelligence Committee on Wednesday that adding The Atlantic editor Jeffrey Goldberg to the Signal chat was a "mistake."

item.title: WATCH: Daughter travels 24 hours to surprise parents after 3 years apart
item.description: Darci Condran and her parents had a heartwarming reunion after not seeing each other for three years while she lived in Australia.
